snippet: Management experts offer retreats focusing on the nonspiritual part of leading a parish.
abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column on Toolbox for Pastoral Management, retreat in St Johns, Fla, that teaches priests business of running their own parishes; retreat is project of the National Leadership Roundtable on Church Management, founded in 2005 by lay Catholics to offer management expertise to Catholic Church.
lead_paragraph: Management experts offer retreats focusing on the nonspiritual part of leading a parish.

headline.print_headline: Helping Catholics by Teaching Priests How to Be the Boss
headline.main: Helping Catholics by Teaching Priests How to Be the Boss

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: National Leadership Roundtable on Church Management
